name: land of lies: the great insult
name_original: land of lies: the great insult
description:
this is a 2d platformer game which show a great adventure of a boy who lies a lot and his mother told him to never lie to anyone ever or the devil will take you to the land of lies and here is our liar having a great adventure!!!

you can move using the arrows keys and z for jumb x for shooting 

have fun guys!!!
